channel.title: Hexo on David Moreno blog
channel.description: Recent content in Hexo on David Moreno blog

item.title: Cosmetic changes to my posts archive
item.description: I’ve been doing a lot of cosmetic/layout changes to the nearly 750 posts in my blog’s archive. I apologize if this has broken some feed readers or aggregators. It appears like Hexo still needs better syndication support.
